text: FC is an acronym. FC stands for "Football Club". In the J-League, the team is one of seven with FC in the club name. is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-6. in Gifu Prefecture.Soccerway.com, "FC Gifu"; retrieved 2012-3-4. ==History== The club was founded in 2001. ==League position== *2007: Football League - 3rd *2008: J2 League - 13th *2009: J2 League - 12th *2010: J2 League - 14th *2011: J2 League - 20th *2012: J2 League - 21st *2013: J2 League - 21st *2014: J2 League - 17th *2015: J2 League - 20th *2016: J2 League - 20th *2017: J2 League - 18th *2018: J2 League - 20th *2019: J2 League - 22nd *2020: J3 League - 7th ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams * List of FC Gifu players == References == ==Other websites== * * FC Gifu website * J.League Club Guide Gif Category:Gifu Prefecture
title: FC Gifu
